mapper.select: SELECT ro.*, u.user_id as u_user_id, u.real_name as user_real_name, r.room_id as r_room_id, r.room_number, a.user_id as a_user_id, a.real_name as assignee_real_name FROM repair_order ro LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON ro.user_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN room r ON ro.room_id = r.room_id LEFT JOIN sys_user a ON ro.assignee_id = a.user_id WHERE ro.order_id = #{orderId}

SELECT ro.*, u.user_id as u_user_id, u.real_name as user_real_name, r.room_id as r_room_id, r.room_number, a.user_id as a_user_id, a.real_name as assignee_real_name FROM repair_order ro LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON ro.user_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN room r ON ro.room_id = r.room_id LEFT JOIN sys_user a ON ro.assignee_id = a.user_id ORDER BY ro.create_time DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO repair_order (user_id, room_id, repair_type, description, ai_label, image_path, status, assignee_id, create_time, complete_time) VALUES (#{userId}, #{roomId}, #{repairType}, #{description}, #{aiLabel}, #{imagePath}, #{status}, #{assigneeId}, #{createTime}, #{completeTime})
mapper.update:
UPDATE repair_order
user_id = #{userId},
room_id = #{roomId},
repair_type = #{repairType},
description = #{description},
ai_label = #{aiLabel},
image_path = #{imagePath},
status = #{status},
assignee_id = #{assigneeId},
create_time = #{createTime},
complete_time = #{completeTime},
WHERE order_id = #{orderId}
